questions.question: What are the three core areas of Jesse Pollak‚Äôs top priorities, according to his November 26, 2025 post?
options: Developer infra (Farcaster + onchain data), Neynar AI, App studio (vibe code mini apps)
Scaling Base, New token listings, White hat agent deployment
Regulatory compliance, Austin office expansion, Clanker token development
Decentralized storage solutions, Wallet yield farming, Limit order implementation
questions.explanation: JP listed Developer infra, Neynar AI, and App studio as his top three priorities.

questions.question: Jesse Pollak stated that after reading a chain, what is the next logical step for the ecosystem?
options: We write to a chain next. ü™ê
We read from a hub next.
questions.explanation: The post states: 'We read a chain now, we write to a chain next. ü™ê'

questions.question: According to the Anthropic report cited by Jesse Pollak, what percentage of blockchain exploits carried out in the post-March 2025 portion of their benchmark could have been executed autonomously by current AI agents?
questions.explanation: JP quoted the report: 'AI agents have gone from exploiting 2%... to 55.88%.'

questions.question: What new role did Jesse Pollak assign himself after using a Clanker mini app?
questions.explanation: JP posted: 'I didn‚Äôt consider myself one but on this mini app I'm a TRADER!'

questions.question: Dan Romero announced a 'New experiment: Weekly Clanker Roundup.' What is the primary purpose of this roundup?
options: To help more Clanker projects get discovered on a regular cadence.
To provide trading signals for Clanker tokens.
To report on Clanker security vulnerabilities.
To coordinate Clanker fee sink distributions.
questions.explanation: DR stated the goal: 'We'd like to help more Clanker projects get discovered on a regular cadence.'

questions.question: Who did Brian Armstrong credit, saying, 'i honestly wouldn't be here if [they] wasn't here'?
questions.explanation: Brian Armstrong posted this about @linda on December 11, 2025.

questions.question: What feature did Jesse Pollak specifically praise about the prints mini app built by @priyanka?
options: The admin view that @priyanka set up for herself to see the orders coming in.
questions.explanation: JP said: 'my favorite part was the admin view that @priyanka set up for herself to see the orders coming in.'

questions.question: What three core Wallet features were listed as priorities by Dan Romero?
options: Yield, Limit orders, Prototyping prediction markets
NFT auctions, Wallet Connect integration, KYC/AML solutions
Multivaults, Fee sinks, Manual trader outreach
questions.explanation: DR's priorities list included Wallet: Yield - Limit orders - Prototyping prediction markets - Manual trader outreach.

questions.question: What type of companion did Brian Armstrong mint that 'carries a small and reassuring best friend' and contains DNA from a Farcaster friend?
questions.explanation: BA posted: 'I just minted a petlet. My Warplet now carries a small and reassuring best friend.'

questions.question: What significant financial milestone did a user claim to achieve using money 'almost entirely made on Farcaster' tokens, including Clanker, Degen, and Higher?
options: Funding a new Mini App Studio
questions.explanation: Dan Romero shared a quote from a user: 'I am closing on my first house next week with money that was almost entirely made on Farcaster.'

questions.question: When reporting a Farcaster app bug, Dan Romero stated that users are more likely to get a fix if they provide what?
options: A Neynar API lookup of the missing cast
questions.explanation: DR noted: 'We're more likely to fix a bug if you have a screenshot or screenrecording!'

questions.question: What specific high-level Farcaster metric did Jesse Pollak ask Neynar to provide data for across the entire protocol in the past 24 hours?
questions.explanation: JP asked: '@neynar how many likes across the entire farcaster protocol in the past 24 hours?'

questions.question: What does the abbreviation BDFOFF stand for, as used in Dan Romero's 'Semi-regular Farcaster annoyances thread'?
options: Benevolent Dictator For One Farcaster Feature
Blockchain Development and Feature Optimization Fund
questions.explanation: DR defined the term: 'BDFOFF = benevolent dictator for one farcaster feature'

questions.question: Who did Jesse Pollak direct users to DM if they were looking to build a mini app?
questions.explanation: JP advised: 'DM @calvino to try it out.'

questions.question: According to the Anthropic report, how much did the total exploit revenue covered by AI agents increase, corresponding to the leap from 2% to 55.88% of exploited vulnerabilities?
questions.explanation: JP quoted the leap: 'a leap from $5,000 to $4.6 million in total exploit revenue.'

questions.question: What specific type of Mini App did Brian Armstrong ask if anyone had built?
options: One that tracks a global sentiment index for farcaster
One that tracks the price of Clanker tokens
One that provides decentralized physical infrastructure (DePIN) data
One that organizes brick side chats
questions.explanation: BA asked: 'Is there a miniapp that tracks a global sentiment index for farcaster?'

questions.question: How many of the top 12 Clanker tokens did Jesse Pollak claim to hold?
questions.explanation: JP stated: 'I have 4/12 top Clanker tokens.'

questions.question: In a post from 2023, what topic did the official Base account ask gym goers for advice on?
options: Staying consistent but still pushing yourself
questions.explanation: The post reads: 'Gym goers: What‚Äôs the best advice you have for staying consistent but still pushing yourself?'

questions.question: In his request to Neynar for an introduction based on his top casts, what specific vibe constraint did Jesse Pollak impose?
options: Write as if you're telling a friend about me, focusing on my projects, interests, and vibe.
Write a formal press release detailing my professional achievements.
Ensure the introduction uses data on my followers and internal stats.
Write a cast shorter than 100 characters.
questions.explanation: JP requested Neynar: 'focus on my projects, interests, and vibe. write as if you're telling a friend about me.'

questions.question: Under Dan Romero‚Äôs Clanker priorities, what specific transaction features were listed related to managing token value or distribution?
options: Fee sinks, burner pool extension, and rethinking how to do presales / fair launch
Community governance polls and social signaling tools
questions.explanation: The Clanker list includes: 'Fee sinks, burner pool extension - Rethinking how to do presales / fair launch'

questions.question: What type of analysis did Jesse Pollak ask Neynar to perform on his casts over the last year, seeking self-improvement insight?
options: Compare my engagement to the average user
questions.explanation: JP asked: '@neynar can you analyze my casts over the last year and tell me my biggest weakness'

questions.question: Which specific project did Brian Armstrong state he supported by joining a bid on a $QR auction?
questions.explanation: BA posted: 'i learned about @vmfcoin not too long ago great initiative join my bid on today's $QR auction to support them'

questions.question: What is the specific goal Dan Romero listed for prototyping under the Wallet section of his priorities?
questions.explanation: DR's Wallet list includes: 'Prototyping prediction markets'

questions.question: Jesse Pollak complained about the inability to use 'different/pseudo phone numbers across services' as a side effect of what event?
questions.explanation: JP referenced this as 'one of worst side effects of the Coinbase hack.'

questions.question: Which specific keyboard did Brian Armstrong describe as a 'custom build DZ60RGB' with 'super silent keys'?
questions.explanation: BA stated: 'custom build DZ60RGB super silent keys'

questions.question: In March 2024, the official Base account noted that their revenue had doubled, based on a post written by whom?
questions.explanation: The post links to 'https://www.ashprabaker.com/p/i-just-wanna-go-viral-on-tiktok-help'.

questions.question: After the prints mini app, Jesse Pollak mentioned that transaction-enabled apps built on Neynar App Studio (NAS) would be shipping when?
options: By the end of the year
questions.explanation: JP said: 'more of these transaction-enabled apps built on nas getting shipped next week.'

questions.question: Dan Romero suggested that federal licenses are better than state-by-state licensing because they are especially great for pre-empting which specific regulatory body?
options: NYDFS (New York Department of Financial Services)
questions.explanation: DR stated: 'Especially great to pre-empt NYDFS.'

questions.question: When Jesse Pollak asked Neynar to introduce him using analysis of his casts, what was the required opening phrase for the introduction?
questions.explanation: JP's request concluded: 'begin with "manan is ..."'

questions.question: Which keyboard did Brian Armstrong call a 'personal favorite' that has an 'aluminum casing [that] adds a nice solid weight to it'?
questions.explanation: BA posted about the 'Q60 QMK - aluminum casing adds a nice solid weight to it'.

questions.question: What specific launch mechanism did Dan Romero mention rethinking under Clanker priorities?
questions.explanation: DR's list included: 'Rethinking how to do presales / fair launch'

questions.question: Jesse Pollak clarified that using Farcaster through the Base app does not affect what specific metric?
questions.explanation: JP posted: 'Using farcaster through the Base app does not lower your Neynar score'

questions.question: According to Dan Romero, what cryptocurrency price milestone did the approval of ETFs help the market achieve?
questions.explanation: DR posted: 'ETFs got us to $120K, but remaining marginal buyers...' (implying $120K was the high mark achieved by ETFs).

questions.question: The AI vulnerability report discussing the 55.88% exploit rate, cited by Jesse Pollak, was published by which organization?
questions.explanation: The link shared by JP was to 'https://red.anthropic.com/2025/smart-contracts/'.

questions.question: What is the main function of the 'App studio' component in Jesse Pollak's top priorities list?
questions.explanation: JP listed priority 3 as 'App studio: vibe code mini apps'

questions.question: Brian Armstrong encouraged followers to help which specific Mini App reach the #1 ranking?
questions.explanation: BA posted: 'let's get wishlist.holiday miniapp to #1'

questions.question: In November 2023, Mircea Pasoi (Coinbase) shared a personal story about discovering what about himself?
options: He is on the autism spectrum.
He had closed a major fundraising round.
He was building a Python Hub.
questions.explanation: The post links to a blog where he shared 'how I discovered I have autism'.

questions.question: What specific item or feature related to security/storage was listed under Dan Romero's Clanker priorities?
questions.explanation: The Clanker priority list included 'Multivaults'.

questions.question: What analogy did Brian Armstrong use to describe the relaxed nature of his casual brick side chat?
questions.explanation: BA suggested users join if they 'want to come and just leave it on as a radio'.

questions.question: Besides institutional money managers shifting 'one funeral at a time,' who did Dan Romero identify as the remaining marginal buyers after the ETF milestone?
questions.explanation: DR listed: '1. Sovereigns (slowly starting to happen) 2. "One funeral at a time" institutional money manager shift'

questions.question: Who did Dan Romero specifically mention was making progress supporting Clanker ecosystem builders?
questions.explanation: DR posted: '@linda has been making progress supporting Clanker ecosystem builders'

questions.question: Jesse Pollak asked Neynar to create a ticket for which user?
questions.explanation: JP posted: '@neynar make @grin a ticket for this'

questions.question: Which action listed under Wallet priorities did Dan Romero pair with 'Manual trader outreach'?
questions.explanation: In his priority list, 'Prototyping prediction markets' is listed immediately before 'Manual trader outreach.'

questions.question: Jesse Pollak shared an anecdote about a landlord raising rent in the Bay Area, citing the opening of whose new office nearby?
questions.explanation: The landlord reportedly said 'Anthropic's new office opened nearby.'

questions.question: Dan Romero rated which US full-service banking product 10/10?
questions.explanation: DR stated: 'Mercury is the best US full-service banking product. 10/10'

questions.question: Jesse Pollak mentioned that the next development step for mini apps would involve replying directly to what specific type of cast?
questions.explanation: JP mentioned: 'next up - replying to /someone-build casts with the mini apps'

questions.question: What component of the Clanker ecosystem did Dan Romero mention needed revamping or replacement by the new weekly roundup?
questions.explanation: DR listed: 'Revamping Clanker Spotlight / new weekly roundup'

questions.question: What was the duration over which Dan Romero posted Farcaster App DAU/WAU/MAU metrics?
questions.explanation: DR posted: 'Farcaster App DAU / WAU / MAU for the last 2 years'

questions.explanation: The quote shared by DR listed 'Degen, Higher, Anon, Clanker, Aether.'
